segments.text: have you seen the new Cosmo magazine that I was reading this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I may have seen it on the kitchen table .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you're right , thanks . There's an interesting interview with a top director about his latest film that I want to finish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's Martin Scorsese . You liked his film , The Departed , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it was fantastic ! Can I read the article when you're finished ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure . You know it has an online edition , too . You should go online to read if you want to read it now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's ok . I'll wait until you're finished . Just out of curiosity , do you have a subscription for that magadize ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no . I don't buy it regularly enough for it to be worthwhile .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how much does the magadize cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's almost three pounds now , and I think they're going to put the price up to four pounds soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's quite expensive . Who is their target audience ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cosmo mainly has a middle-class readership , but I think circulation will fall dramatically if the price goes up anymore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet you'll still buy it , though . You wouldn't be able to live without your fashion magazine !
segments.speaker: S2
